MFPA.title: Map File Preparation Application (MFPA)
MFPA.description: A web application to identify files with geographic content that intersect or are contained within an area defined by the user, developed for defense systems company Thales UK.
text: Manage layers page - User can import or delete folders
Import layer modal - User can drag and drop or select folder from computer
Import preview - User can see a file tree, total files to be imported, and total size
Define area page - User can draw polygon by hand or coordinates, in this case, drawing by hand. User can also hover over the polygon to see coordinates and area
Results page - User can see intersecting files, select which files to get, and get the files. User can also save the area for later
Get area modal - User can choose to copy, move, or create a .txt file with the file path
Define area page - User can draw polygon from coordinates with Decimal Degree (DD), Degrees, Minutes, and Seconds (DMS), and Degrees and Decimal Minutes (DMM) formats
Define area page - Draw polygon from DD coordinates
Search bar - User can search for cities, towns, villages, hamlets in UK, and also countries
Search bar - User can search and pin multiple coordinates (DD, DMS, DMM)
Sort options - User can sort saved area by date and name
Search area - User can search for saved area by name
Rename area - User can rename saved area
Delete area - User can delete saved area
About - User can see app information, documentations, and team members

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A revamped portfolio website from previous React.js, JavaScript, and pure CSS to Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, and NextUI. This website is a personal project to showcase my skills and experience, as well as to share my knowledge and experience with others.

kanbaru.title: Kanbaru
kanbaru.description: A kanban-style project management application provides customizable task organization with visual intuitiveness, date and time options, and detailed descriptions. Users can refine project planning and management with ease.

mystudyplan.title: MyStudyPlan
mystudyplan.description: A comprehensive academic tracking application offers a centralized dashboard for efficient viewing of class assignments, tasks, and exams. Users can access a calendar view option, streamlining academic planning and management.

calclab.title: CalcLab
calclab.description: An all-encompassing application combines a scientific calculator with graph plotting capabilities, a date comparator, a real-time currency converter, and 12 more converter tools, offering efficient mathematical calculations and conversions.

matrix.title: Matrix-Arithmetic
matrix.description: A feature-packed matrix arithmetic program that operates within the terminal. This tool encompasses addition, subtraction, multiplication, scalar multiplication, exponentiation, determinant computation, transposition, inversion, and adjoint matrix operations.
text: Input matrix through the terminal/command line
Suppose we have a file containing comma-separated values
We just specify the delimiter as a , and simply press enter

nekoparaiten.title: Nekoparaiten
nekoparaiten.description: An (April Fool's) online speed-clicking game written in Python. Click as fast as possible while also competing with other people around the world! Nekoparaiten is an anime Neko romance simulation mobile game originally created by Sayori (NEKO WORKs) and developed by Yostar Games.

acemath.title: AceMath
acemath.description: An online speed mathematics game. Solve math problems as fast as you can while also competing with other people around the world!
